verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <WH623> of Asaph אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֡ים <WH430> O God בָּ֤אוּ <WH935> are come גוֹיִ֨ם ׀ <WH1471> the heathen בְּֽנַחֲלָתֶ֗ךָ <WH5159> into thine inheritance טִ֭מְּאוּ <WH2930> have they defiled אֶת־ <WH853> הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> temple קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH6944> thy holy שָׂ֖מוּ <WH7760> they have laid אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <WH3389> Jerusalem לְעִיִּֽים׃ <WH5856> on heaps

נָֽתְנ֡וּ <WH5414> have they given אֶת־ <WH853> נִבְלַ֬ת <WH5038> The dead bodies עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <WH5650> of thy servants מַ֭אֲכָל <WH3978> [to be] meat לְע֣וֹף <WH5775> unto the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of the heaven בְּשַׂ֥ר <WH1320> the flesh חֲ֝סִידֶ֗יךָ <WH2623> of thy saints לְחַיְתוֹ־ <WH2416> unto the beasts אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

שָׁפְכ֬וּ <WH8210> have they shed דָמָ֨ם ׀ <WH1818> Their blood כַּמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> like water סְֽבִ֘יב֤וֹת <WH5439> round about יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <WH3389> Jerusalem וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and there קוֹבֵֽר׃ <WH6912> and [there was] none to bury

הָיִ֣ינוּ <WH1961> have חֶ֭רְפָּה <WH2781> We are become a reproach לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <WH7934> to our neighbours לַ֥עַג <WH3933> a scorn וָ֝קֶ֗לֶס <WH7047> and derision לִסְבִיבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5439> to them that are round about

עַד־ <WH5704> long מָ֣ה <WH4100> How יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Jehovah תֶּאֱנַ֣ף <WH599> be angry לָנֶ֑צַח <WH5331> alway תִּבְעַ֥ר <WH1197> burn כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> like אֵ֝֗שׁ <WH784> burning קִנְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH7068> envy

שְׁפֹ֤ךְ <WH8210> Pour out חֲמָתְךָ֨ <WH2534> thy wrath אֶֽל־ <WH413> upon הַגּוֹיִם֮ <WH1471> upon the heathen אֲשֶׁ֪ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not יְדָ֫ע֥וּךָ <WH3045> that have not known וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> and upon מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <WH4467> thee and upon the kingdoms אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ֗ <WH8034> upon thy name לֹ֣א <WH3808> not קָרָֽאוּ׃ <WH7121> that have not called

כִּ֭י <WH3588> for אָכַ֣ל <WH398> For they have devoured אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> Jacob וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> נָוֵ֥הוּ <WH5116> his dwelling place הֵשַֽׁמּוּ׃ <WH8074> and laid waste אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תִּזְכָּר־ <WH2142> burn

לָנוּ֮ עֲוֹנֹ֪ת <WH5771> iniquities רִאשֹׁ֫נִ֥ים <WH7223> not against us former מַ֭הֵר <WH4118> speedily יְקַדְּמ֣וּנוּ <WH6923> prevent רַחֲמֶ֑יךָ <WH7356> let thy tender mercies כִּ֖י <WH3588> for דַלּ֣וֹנוּ <WH1809> low מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> very

עָזְרֵ֤נוּ ׀ <WH5826> Help אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <WH430> us O God יִשְׁעֵ֗נוּ <WH3468> of our salvation עַל־ <WH5921> and דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> for כְּבֽוֹד־ <WH3519> the glory שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> of thy name וְהַצִּילֵ֥נוּ <WH5337> and deliver וְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> us and purge away עַל־ <WH5921> and חַ֝טֹּאתֵ֗ינוּ <WH2403> our sins לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> sake שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> for thy name's

לָ֤מָּה ׀ <WH4100> Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> say הַגּוֹיִם֮ <WH1471> Wherefore should the heathen אַיֵּ֪ה <WH346> Where אֱ‍ֽלֹהֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH430> angels יִוָּדַ֣ע <WH3045> acknowledge [בַּגִּיִּים כ] (בַּגֹּויִ֣ם <WH1471> the nations ק) לְעֵינֵ֑ינוּ <WH5869> in our sight נִ֝קְמַ֗ת <WH5360> [by] the revenging דַּֽם־ <WH1818> of the blood עֲבָדֶ֥יךָ <WH5650> of thy servants הַשָּׁפֽוּךְ׃ <WH8210> [which is] shed

תָּ֤ב֣וֹא <WH935> come לְפָנֶיךָ֮ <WH6440> before אֶנְקַ֪ת <WH603> Let the sighing אָ֫סִ֥יר <WH616> prisoner כְּגֹ֥דֶל <WH1433> thee according to the greatness זְרוֹעֲךָ֑ <WH2220> of thy power ה֝וֹתֵ֗ר <WH3498> preserve בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> thou those that are appointed תְמוּתָֽה׃ <WH8546> to die

וְהָ֘שֵׁ֤ב <WH7725> And render לִשְׁכֵנֵ֣ינוּ <WH7934> unto our neighbours שִׁ֭בְעָתַיִם <WH7659> sevenfold אֶל־ <WH413> into חֵיקָ֑ם <WH2436> into their bosom חֶרְפָּ֘תָ֤ם <WH2781> their reproach אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which חֵרְפ֣וּךָ <WH2778> wherewith they have reproached אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <WH136> thee O Lord

וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> we עַמְּךָ֨ ׀ <WH5971> So we thy people וְצֹ֥אן <WH6629> and sheep מַרְעִיתֶךָ֮ <WH4830> of thy pasture נ֤וֹדֶ֥ה <WH3034> will give thee thanks לְּךָ֗ לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> to all וָדֹ֑ר <WH1755> generations נְ֝סַפֵּ֗ר <WH5608> we will shew forth תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8416> thy praise
